titleStmt.title: The natural history of Oxford-shire, being an essay toward the natural history of England. / By Robert Plot ...
titleStmt.author: Plot, Robert, 1640-1696.

biblFull.extent: [10], 358, [12] p., 16 leaves of plates : ill., map (folded).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater in Oxford, and are to be had there: and in London at Mr. Moses Pits at the Angel in St. Pauls Church-yard, and at Mr. S. Millers, at the Star near the west-end of St. Pauls Church.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford) Library.
